name: Venomous Mummy
description: The Venomous Mummy is a medium undead creature wrapped in tattered, venom-soaked bandages, exuding a toxic presence.
memorable: Its ability to unleash poisonous smoke upon taking fire damage, and its curse mechanism which can potentially kill over time, make it a terrifying opponent.
goals: To curse and poison adventurers who disturb its rest.
relations: Often found guarding ancient tombs or ruins, potentially allied with other undead.
environment: Tombs, ancient ruins, or cursed burial grounds.
strengths: Immune to necrotic and poison damage, resistant to nonmagical physical attacks, and several conditions.
attacks: Uses its Venomous Fist to deal significant bludgeoning and poison damage, with a chance to curse the target.
most_powerful_ability: Toxic Smoke that creates a poisonous area, affecting multiple creatures and obscuring vision.
additional_information: Immunity to conditions like charmed and frightened.
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep.
Toxic smoke lingers and expands when damaged by fire.
Venom-soaked wraps cause poison damage upon contact.
Cursed targets must make Constitution saves daily or face diminishing strength.
test_queries: undead creature with toxic smoke ability
mummy that deals poison damage in combat
monster immune to necrotic and poison
